dissonanceFlags.description: The speaker's facial expression does not match the excitement mentioned in the speech.
dissonanceFlags.coaching: Practice maintaining consistent facial expressions that align with the message.
dissonanceFlags.visualEvidence: Neutral facial expression while talking about excitement.
dissonanceFlags.verbalEvidence: I'm really excited about this opportunity.

dissonanceFlags.description: The speaker uses 'this' without pointing to anything specific.
dissonanceFlags.coaching: Use hand gestures to emphasize key points.

dissonanceFlags.description: The speaker uses filler words frequently, which can distract the audience.
dissonanceFlags.coaching: Work on reducing filler words to maintain a clear and focused delivery.

dissonanceFlags.description: Hands stay still during explanations that need visual support.
dissonanceFlags.coaching: Consider adding more dynamic gestures to engage the audience visually.
dissonanceFlags.visualEvidence: Hands remain still while explaining the tool's functionality.
dissonanceFlags.verbalEvidence: to find the patterns and prepare their team for the upcoming games.

strengths: Clear speech with minimal filler words
priorities: Match facial expressions to your words

transcript.text: hi i'm ramese a solo founder of tactical ai i'm
building ai powered tactical analysis for soccer teams i've been
passionate about soccer since early childhood playing competitively back home
in my country before coming to united states for studies
since early twenty twenty five i've been working part time
with my college soccer team and i noticed that coaches
spend hours and hours on reviewing the past game footages
to find the patterns and prepare their team for the
upcoming games i'm building a tool that allows teams to
upload the video of the match and with help of
machine learning we extract the data about speed distance formation
etcetera then we pass this data to llm to provide
the contextual feedback and advices for the coach mvp is
done we are launching next week with two pilot teams
this is my childhood dream being a tech founder who
solves a real world problems thank you

geminiReport.coachingAdvice:
The presentation demonstrated strong initial eye contact, a well-paced delivery, and minimal use of filler words. The speaker maintained composed body language throughout the session.

While initial eye contact was strong, consistency wavered at points. There was a notable disconnect between verbal enthusiasm, such as stating 'thrilled to present,' and facial expressions, which conveyed anxiety. Furthermore, verbal cues like 'look at this data' were not consistently supported by corresponding physical gestures or screen interaction.

To enhance engagement, implement the
geminiReport.headline: Clear and articulate speaker
